spatial_accuracy.notes: Significant layout distortions. The primary corridor and room adjacencies are misinterpreted. The Kitchen/Laundry/WC cluster is incorrectly merged and repositioned. Door and window counts do not align with the original floor plan.

structural_fidelity.notes: While the roof is removed and there is no UI text, the structural reinterpretation is severe (E4). The garage is missing as a separate unit, and internal wall alignments have been hallucinated into a different configuration.

furniture_mapping.notes: Furniture such as the sofa and bed are present but misplaced relative to the original room functions. Scale is inconsistent with the layout proportions.

aesthetic_quality.notes: High adherence to style constraints. Low-poly geometry, flat shading, and isometric camera perspective are correctly executed. Neutral floating background is well-maintained.

detected_errors.description: Missing Garage structure and specific kitchen/laundry fixtures.
Major layout distortion in the bathroom/WC area and kitchen placement.
Hallucinated long green partition wall and alternate hallway configuration not present in 2D plan.
